sections.comments: BIOL 121 is offered in TERM 1,  TERM 2 and summer session.  1st year Biology labs are a separate course (BIOL 140) and are listed separately.  For more information about Biology courses see www.biology.ubc.ca

This is the wait-list for BIOL 121-121.  Wait-lists will be opened after all of the seats in the lecture sections have been released. Please do not contact course instructors about registration issues, as course registrations/ wait-lists are managed by the course registration coordinator.  Students are moved in chronological order from the wait-list into the course as space becomes available.  Timetables may be modified to allow for conflict-free registration.  It is the students responsibility to check SSC for registration changes.  Information on wait-list positioning will not be provided.

description: Principles of storage and transmission of genetic variation; origin and evolution of species and their ecological interactions. Credit will be granted for only one of BIOL 121 or BIOL 344.
